rComments: History 165: The Power of Writing is one of the best classes I have ever taken. Professor Remak is extremely knowledgeable and will gladly help you if you have any questions. Without a doubt the best hands on learning experience you can get. Workload is manageable and class size is small. A must take class for European Medieval history fans.

Amazing professor, one of the best at UCSC; took the class expecting boring lectures, but did more hands-on work than anything else. We didn't get a trip to the Getty, but it was because of time constraints. Love her, would take her again in a minute.
Just fantastic! Amazing lectures and reading materials. Organized a field trip to the Getty. She gave great feedback on written work. We all thought she was a total mom.
